TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IInvokeOnGetBinder

summary.span: Represents information about a dynamic get member operation that indicates if the get member should invoke properties when they perform the get operation.

span.span: Represents information about a dynamic get member operation that indicates if the get member should invoke properties when they perform the get operation.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property InvokeOnGet As Boolean
public: property bool InvokeOnGet { bool get(); };

summary.span: Gets the value indicating if this get member operation should invoke properties when they perform the get operation.

span.span: Gets the value indicating if this get member operation should invoke properties when they perform the get operation.

summary.span: The default value when this interface is not present is true.

span.span: The default value when this interface is not present is true.

value.span: True, wenn diese memberabrufvorgang Eigenschaften aufgerufen werden sollen, wenn sie das Get-Vorgang ausführen. andernfalls "false".

span.span: True if this get member operation should invoke properties when they perform the get operation; otherwise false.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Diese Eigenschaft wird von einigen Sprachen verwendet, um bessere abzurufen [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_com](~/includes/tla2sharptla-com-md.md)] interoperation Erfahrung.This property is used by some languages to get a better [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_com](~/includes/tla2sharptla-com-md.md)] interoperation experience. Wenn der Wert festgelegt ist, auf "false", die dynamische [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_com](~/includes/tla2sharptla-com-md.md)] Objekt wird nicht das Objekt aufrufen, jedoch wird stattdessen binden auf den Namen und Objekt zurück, die aufgerufen werden kann oder indexed später das.When the value is set to false, the dynamic [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_com](~/includes/tla2sharptla-com-md.md)] object will not invoke the object but will instead bind to the name, and return an object that can be invoked or indexed later. Dies ist nützlich für indizierte Eigenschaften und Sprachen, die keine InvokeMember Aufrufsites erzeugen.This is useful for indexed properties and languages that do not produce InvokeMember call sites.
